p: In Table 2, caries experience showed a significant increase in control group ( P = .006 by paired t-test) but non-significant in experimental group. PS and BOP showed significant decreases in experimental group ( P < .001 for PS and P = .004 for BOP by paired t-test) but non-significant in control group. Salivary flow rate showed significant decreases in both experimental ( P = .027 by paired t-test) and control group ( P < .001).
